class.name: HTMLBuilder
class.brief_description: A class that can be used to easily build html from code.
class.description:
A class that can be used to easily build html from code. This class has helper methods for all valid HTML tags. It have an another set, but with a c prefix, these methods write the closing tag. All of these helpers return an [HTMLTag], this allows for the addition of arguments into the tags. This [HTMLTag] should not be stored, it's reused internally. Some of these methods also have alternates with parameters for the most common attributes, like the link tag (a) has a helper method that takes the link, class, id as an argument for convenience. Other helper methods, like [code]input_*[/code] are also available, these should simplify the creation of forms. The [code]w()[/code] helper method is provided for appending strings directly at the end. The [code]wn[/code], [code]wns[/code], etc. helpers can be used to append numbers (converted to string) to the output. Helper methods are also provided for the easy addition of csrf tokens to forms. These can protect from forged form submissions. [code]var a : float = _model.predict() va b : HTMLBuilder = HTMLBuilder.new()
b.h5().attrib("align", "center") b.w("The model predicted:").br() b.w("Current: ").wn(a).w(" Units") b.w(".").br() b.ch5()
request.body += b.result[/code]

method.name: fa
method.description: Helper method to generate a fully formed HTML a tag with it's closing tag.

method.name: fdiv
method.description: Helper method to generate a fully formed HTML div tag with it's closing tag.

method.name: flabel
method.description: Helper method to generate a fully formed HTML label tag with it's closing tag.

method.name: foption
method.description: Helper method to generate a fully formed HTML option tag with it's closing tag.

method.name: form_get
method.description: Helper method to generate a form with method type get.

method.name: form_post
method.description: Helper method to generate a form with method type post.

method.name: form_postr
method.description: Helper method to generate a form with method type post. WIll also add the csrf token as a hidden input from the given request.

method.name: ftextarea
method.description: Helper method to generate a fully formed HTML textarea tag with it's closing tag.

method.name: input_button
method.description: Helper method to generate a button input for a form.

method.name: input_checkbox
method.description: Helper method to generate a checkbox input for a form.

method.name: input_color
method.description: Helper method to generate a color input for a form.

method.name: input_date
method.description: Helper method to generate a date input for a form.

method.name: input_datetime_local
method.description: Helper method to generate a local datetime input for a form.

method.name: input_email
method.description: Helper method to generate an email input for a form.

method.name: input_file
method.description: Helper method to generate a file input for a form.

method.name: input_hidden
method.description: Helper method to generate a hidden input for a form.

method.name: input_image
method.description: Helper method to generate an image input for a form.

method.name: input_month
method.description: Helper method to generate a month input for a form.

method.name: input_number
method.description: Helper method to generate a number input for a form.

method.name: input_password
method.description: Helper method to generate a password input for a form.

method.name: input_radio
method.description: Helper method to generate a radio input for a form.

method.name: input_range
method.description: Helper method to generate a range input for a form.

method.name: input_reset
method.description: Helper method to generate a reset input for a form.

method.name: input_search
method.description: Helper method to generate a search input for a form.

method.name: input_submit
method.description: Helper method to generate a submit input for a form.

method.name: input_tel
method.description: Helper method to generate a tel input for a form.

method.name: input_text
method.description: Helper method to generate a text input for a form.

method.name: input_time
method.description: Helper method to generate a time input for a form.

method.name: input_url
method.description: Helper method to generate an url input for a form.

method.name: input_week
method.description: Helper method to generate a week input for a form.

method.name: tag
method.description: Create any (or custom) HTML tag. Simple means self closing.

method.name: wbn
method.description: Append bool as a number to the result.

method.name: wbr
method.description: Append br tag to the result.

method.name: wbs
method.description: Append bool as text to the result.

method.name: we
method.description: HTML escape, then append string to the result.

method.name: wns
method.description: Append number as scientific to the result.

method.name: write_tag
method.description: Finish writing the currently open tag.

method.name: wui
method.description: Append unsigned integer to the result.
